attributes.action: Keep and increase the restaurant cars on the London to Norwich trains
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
National Express East Anglia are proposing to do away with the restaurant cars on services from Liverpool St to Norwich. This is just another reduction in the quality of service of Britain's train operators. If National Express get their way, passengers will be joining those on virgin services eating plastic sealed junk food instead of traditionally made fresh meals. 

They must be prevented from removing the restaurants from those trains as well as stopped from reducing the number of them.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
